caption: Authentic Korean Fried Chicken!  I should just stop there, because if you know what real KFC is supposed to taste like, then you know what I'm talking about. And if you know what the soggy fake KFC salty sauce bombs taste like then you'll know that this (thankfully) isn't that.
The team at Peeps kitchen have been among the best we've dealt with. Always a pleasure. Our office is crazy about their fried chicken and dumplings. Thanks Peeps.

Delicious food and very friendly staff/owners! Was thanked several times during my pickup, even by the delivery man while I was crossing the street. The packaging is also very nice (love the tray the dumplings came in).
The chicken is great, the sauce is great, the service is great; not much more to say.
Nice staff and great food! The chicken sandwich, boneless thighs, Peeps Gang Jeong and potato wedges are all very yummy and our go-to's.

If I could give more stars to this place I would. The chicken is immaculate. Other Korean places that sell chicken cannot compare to Peep’s Kitchen. From the warm golden color to the crispy tenderness, the first bite is quite an experience.
Great chicken. Sauces are a bit overhyped in reviews. Owners are really nice and the chicken sandwiches and fried chicken are amazing.

I never usually leave reviews but holy smokes!! I had this chicken about a week ago and haven't stopped thinking about it. Everything about ordering from here was great. Fast delivery time, super nice delivery driver, and the chicken sandwich was the best i've ever had!! I will 100% be ordering from this place consistently.

Amazing! 1st time, but will not be our last.  We had the fried chicken sandwich, chicken thigh, gang jeong, and sweet potato fries.  Please do yourselves a favor and TRY THE FRIED CHICKEN, literally any type.  The crispy deliciousness paired with their sweet & spicy sauce was a match made in heaven.  When you can get fried chicken in 25 restaurants in a 2 mile radius, it should tell you something that I'm taking the time write a review about this one.  Also, assuming I met the owners during pickup.  Despite the fleeting conversation, in those few moments, their sweetness made me feel so happy I was supporting a small business like theirs :)
If you don’t support this establishment don’t even bother making eye contact with me on the street.
Delicious fried chicken. I highly recommend the thighs. Extremely sweet people running the place
I love this place! The chicken sandwich is amazing, in particular. I'm so happy this spot opened in my neighborhood!
Fantastic food!

Honestly, best fried chicken I’ve had in years. I don’t want to over-hype it, but this place is ultra on point. You can tell they pay attention to detail here. Dipping sauces were great — definitely gives off made from scratch vibes. Very reasonably priced too. After getting tired of all other usual delivery options this late into the pandemic, discovering this spot has made my day. Will definitely order again soon.
Good
they said it’s the best fried chicken in NYC... it’s 100% true. Everything on the menu was fried to perfection! Can’t wait to go again 🙏🏽

I placed and order for pickup here recently and the order was ready early/right on time.  We ordered three different chicken dishes and all were still crispy when we arrived at home! That’s pretty impressive in the winter. The portions were large we probably didn’t need three dishes for two people lol but the variation was nice.  The owner gave us extra chicken and a cute little handwritten note with candy canes. I appreciate the personal touches and good customer service!! Would definitely order again

When this place opened I was hopeful it would be great and it truly is. High quality and delicious chicken. The staff are very friendly every time I go in to pick up food and have even given me extra chicken and sauces to try. Very welcome addition to the neighborhood and I highly recommend!
Epic chicken burgers. Crispy and tender in all the right places.
Phenomenal chicken. Made FRESH with every order. Kind staff and great authentic Korean fired chicken
One of the best chicken sandwiches I’ve eaten! Very welcoming and friendly staff too; highly recommend!
Peeps comes correct. We ordered Peeps on a Friday night and their delivery was swift. The chicken you ask? Juicy, well seasoned and fresh.
Holy wings! These are the best wings I have ever had with great sauce options as well. Super quick and the wings were still steaming hot when I opened it. Peeps knows the good Peeps

Arguably the best fried chicken in Greenpoint, Korean or otherwise. The chicken "burger" sandwich could go head-to-head with Torst's or Commodore's any day of the week, but to me the fried chicken thighs are the real star of the show. Plus, as a bonus, they've got the friendliest staff you could imagine.
Super tasty chicken sandwich. Super friendly staff!

Newly opened Korean fried chicken joint in the neighborhood. As a resident Korean, I approve of this chicken. The Peep chips with cinnamon are especially delicious. They included some handwritten notes which was nice and makes me want to support this small business even more. They also included a sample of their chicken soup which was delicious.

Peep’s Kitchen is by far one of the best fried chicken spots in the area. Maintaining a consistent crispy texture and flavor, their  chicken are for those that want all of that goodness minus the oiliness that usually comes with fried chicken.  The sauces that accompany each order seem to be homemade in the kitchen. Each come with 4 different sauces. My favorite was the one labeled “Extremely Spicy” and is sure to push the right buttons for any spice enthusiast. If spicy isn’t your thing, the other sauces are amazing as well and is certainly worth a try.  Although their fried chicken is to die for, I wouldn’t leave out the rest of the menu either. Their fried chicken burger and fried rice cake skewers are great options as well if you’re looking for other variety.  Peep’s Kitchen is a MUST-GO for fried chicken enthusiasts, or anyone craving a quick fried chicken fix. I will certainly be coming back here soon, and they’ve made a regular out of me!

We ordered two chicken sandwiches and some fries. They threw in some candied sweet potatoes as a sample, along with a hand written note-so sweet! The chicken was PERFECT. Honestly can’t say anything more than it was perfect fried chicken and my new favorite chicken sandwhich in the neighborhood. Support this new biz!

The chicken sandwich is otherworldly. It's a multi-napkin two-hander with a crust so fried and crispy, even the worst delivery drivers with the longest delivery time in history* can't ruin that thicc crunch.  I brought it home for lunch and my partner and I never talked the whole time, save for muffled single-word superlative-expletives directed solely at the sandwich in our mitts.  I'm not even a good writer, but this sandwich just inspired me to send out holiday cards so I'm here sending my thanks-and-praise real quick before googling how to have better penmanship.  *I did carryout, don't roll the dice with a third-party for food this good if you can walk there

I ordered 3 drumsticks and Peeps Gang Jeong (Korean style sweet sauce) crispy and juiiiiccccyyy. They also sent us sample menu to try with personalized notes. I am glad there is an authentic Korean style chicken restaurant in our neighborhood.

Excellent fried chicken that blends the best parts of Korean fried chicken flavors and southern American texture. We had half soy garlic and half no sauce. Both were excellent. They even added some extra wings because, “the chickens were extra small this week.” A+ service.  The shrimp tempura was perfectly crispy on the outside and tender in the center.  We also had nachos with cinnamon and sugar which were the perfect sweet complement to the savory dishes.
Juicy and crispy fried chicken with a good sauce, don’t feel icky after eating it, 5 stars!
Tender, crisp, hot, and fresh. Peeps make chicken worthy of praise. Big props to being affordable. This place should be your go-to spot if you're in Greenpoint and hungry for fried chicken.
I think this is the best restaurant I have been to nothing is better than this restaurant

Their marketing strategy was genius, they crossed the street over to our shop and introduced themselves by handing us a menu and a 6pc sample box of their fried chicken. That alone spoke volumes, so the next day we ordered our office lunch from them. As other reviewers said, the chicken was crunchy on the outside and so succulent and juicy on the inside. The Chicken Burger is the best chicken sandwich I've had.
Without question the best fried chicken I've ever had. My brother had the chicken sandwich and loved it. This place deserves more recognition and customers.
10 out of 10. Highly recommend for Fried Chicken.
Perhaps the best fried chicken I have ever tasted. Their chicken burger is unlike any other.
Their foods are awesome. Delicious with juicy 😋 and crunch. Even all of staffs are so kind.
